[root@pong apache2]# tail -13 conf/httpd.conf | head -6
<Directory "/var/www/photo">
        Options +Indexes Includes FollowSymLinks
        AllowOverride FileInfo AuthConfig
        Order allow,deny
        Allow from all
</Directory>
[root@pong apache2]#

!!!!!!
I have nowhere a '-Indexes' or 'None' options. I have a explicite '+Indexes' in 
my directory and it don't work. autoindex module was compiled built-in.
If I add:
<LocationMatch "^/+$">
    Options Indexes
</LocationMatch>
it seems to become OK, but I don't like this artifice
!!!!!!

creator: name@spam.la
nd@perlig.de
text:
| Options +Indexes Includes FollowSymLinks

This is the problem. *if* you use options predicated with + or minus, you need
to specify *all* of them with + (or -). Like:

Options +Indexes +Includes +FollowSymLinks

Otherwise the first option without + or minus (Includes in that case) clears all
options before it. That's documented behaviour.

Thanks for using Apache.
